metadata.title: CVE-2021-22939 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description: If the Node.js https API was used incorrectly and "undefined" was in passedfor the "rejectUnauthorized" parameter, no error was returned andconnections to servers with an expired certificate would have beenaccepted.

criterions.comment: nodejs package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
